title: Investigation ordered into Thai mass nursery killings
description: At least thirty-eight people died, most of them young children - the government says the whole nation is in grief. Also; Joe Biden pardons all Americans convicted of marijuana possession under federal laws, and, what does Scotland have to do with Pterodactyls?
itunes:subtitle: At least thirty-eight people died, most of them young children
itunes:summary: At least thirty-eight people died, most of them young children - the government says the whole nation is in grief. Also; Joe Biden pardons all Americans convicted of marijuana possession under federal laws, and, what does Scotland have to do with Pterodactyls?
itunes:author: BBC World Service
